title: $1000 off Completely Remodeled 2bd/1br private home, garage, backyard
posting_body: ['This beautiful spacious duplex home is located in the heart of Mountain View - connected to just one unit, with no one above or below you.', 'Completely rebuilt brand new kitchen with open floor layout is a dream to entertain guests, Be the first one to cook there!', '- New Stainless Steel energy efficient appliances (dishwasher, refrigerator, stove, over the range microwave).', '- Brand New Cabinets w/ a beautiful Island', '- Just installed new patio door.', '- Washer/Dryer in unit', '- Brand New hardwood floors', '- Just painted', '- Ample closet spaces for storage', '- Garage parking included', '- Complete privacy from the street and any neighbors.', 'Rarely available home, a must see!', 'please call Brett to schedule a tour at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Move in special is $1,000+ OFF, spread out over 10 months!', 'Move in Special is reflected in the advertised rent!', 'Month 1 -$4,295', 'Months 2-11 $4,195', 'Month 12 - $4,295', 'Working in the Mountain View area or Stanford / Palo Alto area?', 'Easy commute by car or public transportation!', 'Major Silicon Valley tech companies such as Google and LinkedIn are just a short drive from the property.', 'This apartment has a strong sense of community among the neighbors and perfect for young professionals, couples, or anyone looking for a new home!', '1 Year Lease Term', 'Deposit - $2,500 (with good credit)', 'Pet Deposit- $500', 'Pet Rent- $50/month (pet interview required)', 'DISCLAIMER: Good credit required.', 'Call for details: pricing/availability subject to change at any time.', 'Pictures may be similar, but not exact in each unit.', 'Please call to verify availability.']
